title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama. Run large language models locally with a simple Python interface.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama. Use local LLMs in Node or browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models. Plug Llama 3, Mistral, etc. into LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama. Manage models & conversations in a single Docker container.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama. Embed local LLMs in JVM apps with a fluent API.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-use RAG template using Ollama, LangChain & Chroma. Ingest PDFs and chat with them locally.

title: chatbot-ollama
summary: Simple Python chatbot powered by Ollama. Shows how to build a CLI chat interface in 50 lines.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for local code completion.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model. Runs entirely self-hosted.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service. Run LLM-based tests in your pipelines.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim wrapper for Ollama’s REST API. Static-binary friendly for tiny deployments.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama. Type-safe chat & embedding APIs with tokio/async support.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library for Ollama. Add local LLM capabilities to C# apps with minimal boilerplate.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that uses Ollama for private on-prem AI assistance. No data leaves your network.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes, brainstorm ideas, and answer questions via Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama. Use Llama 3 as a generator or embedder in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot with group chat support, conversation memory, and per-user model preferences.
